docs.title: Dynamic Data Gathering Platform
docs.text: Welcome to the documentation for the Dynamic Data Gathering Platform, an open-source tool designed to help you create, customize, and deploy data-gathering forms with ease. Whether you're working on machine learning, academic research, customer feedback, or event registrations, this platform provides a flexible and secure solution for all your data collection needs.

docs.title: Key Features
docs.text:
• Admin Panel: Intuitive interface for designing forms and managing surveys.
  • Customizability: Open-source codebase for modifications.
  • Scalability: Self-hostable on your own server for full control.
  • Data Export: Export collected data in standard formats for easy integration.

docs.title: Why Choose This Platform?
docs.text:
• Privacy: Host the platform on your own server for complete data control.
  • Flexibility: Customize forms and workflows to suit your specific needs.
  • Open Source: Free to use, modify, and distribute.

Get Started

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This guide will walk you through the steps to set up and use the Dynamic Data Gathering Platform.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• A server or local machine with Python 3.6 or higher installed.
  • Basic knowledge of command-line operations.
